text:
Hey there Caitlin! 
I think you should focus on learning about the HR role in any company and put your energy toward learning the ropes of the job without going into the creative field right away. Is there a chance you might be more into a creative role than an HR one? There isn’t really a need to learn about creative roles before learning about HR and all its aspects (eg: compensation, recruitment, learning and development, employee relations...)
There are a lot of material on the Harvard Business Review on HR. I could look for more specific sections and see if I can find some intro to HR management material.
I’ll contact someone at Access VFX for that link that’s not working, would you mind sending it my way?
As for your cover letter you can address it to Anne-Marie Gough and I can put in a word for you. Im not sure they have those opportunities but it’s always worth a try :)
